name: Duplicate Post Page Menu & Custom Post Type
author: Inqsys Technology

sections.description:
This plugin is very useful in creating multiple duplicate entries of a single post, page, menu and custom posts like products, tickets, coupons, events etc. Now you don’t need to create multiple mock post on your website to check the website layout. Create one post and a single click will create a multiple entries for the same post.

If you find this useful, please consider donating and this would help us in the development of the plugin and improve support.

  • Buy Pro Version with extra features & support.
  • Contact us for Support Only Pro Version Users.

Features In Free Version

  • Duplicate Post, Page, Menu and Custom Post Type more than once in a single click.
  • Easy to configure for enabling/disabling specific post/page/custom post type/menu duplication.
  • Using Ajax for duplicating post/page/menu so no more browser freezing in case of large data.

Features in Pro Editions

  • Duplicate Post, Page, Menu and Custom Post Type for upto 100 duplicates in a single click.
  • Easy to configure for enabling/disabling specific post/page/custom post type/menu duplication.
  • Using Ajax for duplicating post/page/menu so no more browser freezing in case of large data.
  • User Roles: Allow specific user roles to access the plugin.
  • Post Types: Option to show Duplicate Page link in post types.
  • Status: Option to select post status after duplication.
  • Link Title: Option to change Duplicate Post Link Title.
  • Post Prefix: Option to add Post Prefix.
  • Post Suffix: Option to add Post Suffix.

Upgrade to Pro Version
sections.installation:
By downloading it from wordpress.org

  1. Download the duplicate-post-page-menu-cpt.zip file and unzip it.
  2. Upload the duplicate-post-page-menu-cpt folder to the wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  3. Activate the Duplicate Post Page Menu & Custom Post Type from plugin page on wordpress admin area.

Alternatively, you can install the plugin automatically through the WordPress Admin Panel

  1. Open your WordPress website admin panel and go to Plugins > Add New
  2. Search by ‘Author’ for ‘inqsys‘
  3. Click on Install Now button and then click on Activate Plugin link

Final Word

If you are facing any difficulty in Duplicate Post Page Menu & Custom Post Type installation then you can contact our support at info@inqsys.com
sections.faq:
Why do I need this plugin?

You can use this plugin to create a duplicate entry of a page, post, custom post type and menu and treat it as a backup entry. Even if you don’t have much content on your site to check your website’s layout, you can duplicate a single post for multiple times just to insure that the website’s design is as you want.

What all I can duplicate using this plugin?

This plugin is helpful in duplicating page, post, custom post type and menu.

Can I duplicate my products, coupons, team member etc kind of post entries?

Yes, all such type of posts are known as custom post and you can also duplicate them using this plugin.

What if I don’t want this plugin to duplicate my post?

You can easily disable/enable the duplication of post, page and menu by checking/unchecking the specific item in settings. After activating the plugin, visit: Settings > ‘Duplicate’ Option

How many post/page I can duplicate at a time using this plugin?

You can only duplicate one post/page/menu per operation. However, you can choose to create more than one duplicate entries of the same post/page/menu.

short_description: The best plugin to duplicate post, page, menu and custom post type multiple times in a single click.
